name: Reign Of Dwarf
description:
Join the official Reign of Dwarf Discord by clicking on the image above!




In Reign of Dwarf, you are left in the wilderness and you will have to exploit all the resources at your disposal to survive, build a fortified base, store what you have been able to harvest, and above all protect it from other players. Evolve in a world that has never been used for open-world survival: the fascinating world of the dwarves!



You'll have to master the ways of hunting for your food. Hunting won't be as easy as you think, there are a lot of animals that will be hard to take down.
If you got a friend to help you, It would be a lot easier.



You will have to collect different resources, build your base, acquire food, make weapons and tools, and fight creatures emblematic of the dwarf world to be able to prosper and complete your evolution.



The combat will revolve around a system of free-form melee, feint, block, and stab. Make your way through the dwarf world! Get full control over your character and your attacks and develop your unique style.



Team up with friends to maximize your chances of success. Note that the servers are designed to support at least 200 users at release and will be upgraded!



If the idea of being a powerful dwarf in a medieval/steampunk world with fearsome creatures such as goblins, orcs, ogres, and more sounds exciting to you, we encourage you to add the game to your wishlist and join our discord to follow our progress on this crazy project.
